text: Alan Irwin Menken (born July 22, 1949) is an American composer, conductor, songwriter, singer, music director and music producer. Menken is best known for his scores and songs for movies produced by Walt Disney Animation Studios. His scores and songs for The Little Mermaid (1989), Beauty and the Beast (1991), Aladdin (1992), and Pocahontas (1995) have each won him two Academy Awards. He also composed the scores and songs for Little Shop of Horrors (1986), Newsies (1992), The Hunchback of Notre Dame (1996), Hercules (1997), Home on the Range (2004), Enchanted (2007) and Tangled (2010). ==References== ==Other websites== *Internet Broadway database Listing *Internet Off-Broadway database Listing *MusicalTalk interview with Alan Menken * * The Whole New World of Alan Menken * Alan Menken: "Beauty and the Beast captures the magic of Disney animations and brings it to the stage" Alan Menken in Barcelona's Beauty and the Beast Category:1949 births Category:American movie score composers Category:Living people Category:Best Original Song Academy Award- winning songwriters Category:Writers from New York City Category:Academy Award winning composers Category:American Grammy Award winners Category:Tony Award winning actors Category:Emmy Award winners
